param.name: vis
param.description: Name of input visibility file

param.name: tablein
param.description: Input cumulative calibration table; use \'\' on first run

param.name: incrtable
param.description: Input incremental calibration table to add

param.name: caltable
param.description: Output (cumulative) calibration table

param.name: field
param.description: List of field names to process from tablein

param.name: calfield
param.description: List of field names to use from incrtable.

param.name: interp
param.description: Interpolation mode to use for resampling incrtable solutions

param.name: accumtime
param.description: Time-interval when create cumulative table

param.name: spwmap
param.description: Spectral window combinations to apply

param.name: spw
param.description: Select spectral window/channels

param.name: intent
param.description: Select observing intent

param.name: selectdata
param.description: Other data selection parameters

param.name: timerange
param.description: Select data based on time range

param.name: uvrange
param.description: Select data within uvrange (default units meters)

param.name: antenna
param.description: Select data based on antenna/baseline

param.name: scan
param.description: Scan number range

param.name: observation
param.description: Select by observation ID(s)

param.name: msselect
param.description: Optional complex data selection (ignore for now)

param.name: docallib
param.description: Use callib or traditional cal apply parameters

param.name: callib
param.description: Cal Library filename

param.name: gaintable
param.description: Gain calibration table(s) to apply on the fly

param.name: gainfield
param.description: Select a subset of calibrators from gaintable(s)

param.name: calwt
param.description: Calibrate data weights per gaintable.

param.name: parang
param.description: Apply parallactic angle correction

param.name: applymode
param.description: Calibration mode: ""="calflag","trial","flagonly", or "calonly"

param.name: flagbackup
param.description: Automatically back up the state of flags before the run?

param.name: asdm
param.description: Name of input ASDM directory

param.name: imagename
param.description: Pre-name of output images

param.name: mode
param.description: Spectral gridding type (mfs, channel, velocity, frequency)

param.name: nchan
param.description: Number of channels (planes) in output image

param.name: start
param.description: First channel in input to use

param.name: width
param.description: Number of input channels to average

param.name: interpolation
param.description: Spectral interpolation(nearest, linear, cubic)

param.name: doconcat
param.description: Concatenate multiple channels into single final image

param.name: psfmode
param.description: Method of PSF calculation to use during minor cycles

param.name: imagermode
param.description: Options: \'csclean\' or \'mosaic\', \' \', uses psfmode

param.name: cyclefactor
param.description: change depth in between of csclean cycle

param.name: cyclespeedup
param.description: Cycle threshold doubles in this number of iteration

param.name: imsize
param.description: x and y image size in pixels. Single value: same for both

param.name: cell
param.description: x and y cell size(s). Default unit arcsec.

param.name: phasecenter
param.description: Image center: direction or field index

param.name: restfreq
param.description: Rest frequency to assign to image (see help)

param.name: stokes
param.description: Stokes params to image (eg I,IV, QU,IQUV); Current autoclean implementation requires Stokes="I".

param.name: weighting
param.description: Weighting of uv (natural, uniform, briggs, ...)

param.name: robust
param.description: Briggs robustness parameter

param.name: noise
param.description: noise parameter for briggs abs mode weighting

param.name: npixels
param.description: number of pixels for superuniform or briggs weighting

param.name: interactive
param.description: use interactive clean (with GUI viewer)

param.name: mask
param.description: Initial cleanbox(es), mask image(s), and/or region(s) used in cleaning

param.name: modelimage
param.description: Name of model image(s) to initialize cleaning

param.name: uvtaper
param.description: Apply additional uv tapering of visibilities

param.name: outertaper
param.description: uv-taper on outer baselines in uv-plane

param.name: innertaper
param.description: uv-taper in center of uv-plane (not implemented)

param.name: niter
param.description: Max number of total clean cycles per channel

param.name: npercycle
param.description: Clean iterations before adding new clean boxes

param.name: npercycle_speedup
param.description: Increase npercycle by this factor if no new regions found.

param.name: gain
param.description: Loop gain for cleaning

param.name: pbcor
param.description: Output primary beam-corrected image

param.name: minpb
param.description: Minimum PB level to use

param.name: clean_threshold
param.description: Flux level to stop cleaning. Must include units.

param.name: Nrms
param.description: Threshold to stop cleaning: current rms * Nrms

param.name: eps_maxres
param.description: Stop cleaning if max abs(residual) changes by less than this factor

param.name: useabsresid
param.description: If True, use absolute value of residual to test for clean convergence.

param.name: allow_maxres_inc
param.description: Stop cleaning if max abs(residual) increases this many times (set to -1 to ignore)

param.name: island_rms
param.description: Threshold for islands when finding clean regions: current rms * island_rms

param.name: diag
param.description: Count diagonal connection as same island?

param.name: peak_rms
param.description: Threshold to add new clean box: peak in island must be at least current rms * peak_rms

param.name: gain_threshold
param.description: Threshold to add new clean box: peak in island must be at least current max residual * gain_threshold

param.name: Npeak
param.description: Max number of new clean regions to add in each iteration.

param.name: shape
param.description: Shape of clean regions: 0 for circles, 1 for boxes, 2 for both.

param.name: boxstretch
param.description: Increase clean region size by this many pixels beyond island size.

param.name: irregsize
param.description: For regions this large (in pixels), use irregular clean region.

param.name: solint
param.description: Solution interval in time[,freq]

param.name: combine
param.description: Data axes which to combine for solve (obs, scan, spw, and/or field)

param.name: refant
param.description: Reference antenna name(s)

param.name: minblperant
param.description: Minimum baselines _per antenna_ required for solve

param.name: minsnr
param.description: Reject solutions below this SNR (only applies for bandtype = B)

param.name: solnorm
param.description: Normalize average solution amplitudes to 1.0

param.name: bandtype
param.description: Type of bandpass solution (B or BPOLY)

param.name: smodel
param.description: Point source Stokes parameters for source model.

param.name: append
param.description: Append solutions to the (existing) table

param.name: fillgaps
param.description: Fill flagged solution channels by interpolation

param.name: degamp
param.description: Polynomial degree for BPOLY amplitude solution

param.name: degphase
param.description: Polynomial degree for BPOLY phase solution

param.name: visnorm
param.description: Normalize data prior to BPOLY solution

param.name: maskcenter
param.description: Number of channels to avoid in center of each band

param.name: maskedge
param.description: Fraction of channels to avoid at each band edge (in %)

param.name: freqdep
param.description: Solve for frequency dependent solutions

param.name: calmode
param.description: Type of solution" (\'ap\', \'p\', \'a\')

param.name: regionfile
param.description: Output region file

param.name: threshold
param.description: Threshold value. Must include units.

param.name: maskname
param.description: Output mask name (optional).

param.name: chanrange
param.description: Range of channel ids

param.name: polrange
param.description: Range of polarization ids

param.name: minsize
param.description: Minimum number of pixels for a boxable island

param.name: overwrite
param.description: Overwrite existing region file?

param.name: tablename
param.description: Name of input table

param.name: mightedit
param.description: Warning: the GUI seems to ignore whether the table tool is opened read-only - just be careful, esp. if filtering.

param.name: sortlist
param.description: Columns to sort by (ascending)

param.name: taql
param.description: TaQL query string for prefiltering the table.

param.name: skipcols
param.description: Columns to omit

param.name: axis
param.description: Which values to use

param.name: datacolumn
param.description: Which data column to use

param.name: useflags
param.description: Take flagging into account? (not implemented)

param.name: xstat
param.description: Statistical information for the calibration table

param.name: caltabold
param.description: Name of the old-style caltable.

param.name: ptype
param.description: Type of data in the new-format caltable ("complex" or "float"; default is "complex").

param.name: caltabnew
param.description: Name of the new-style caltable. If not specified, the suffix ".new" is appended to the name of old-style caltable.

param.name: outlierfile
param.description: Text file with image names, sizes, centers for outliers

param.name: resmooth
param.description: Re-restore the cube image to a common beam when True

param.name: gridmode
param.description: Gridding kernel for FFT-based transforms, default=\'\' None

param.name: wprojplanes
param.description: Number of w-projection planes for convolution

param.name: facets
param.description: Number of facets along each axis (main image only)

param.name: cfcache
param.description: Convolution function cache directory

param.name: rotpainc
param.description: Parallactic angle increment (degrees) for OTF A-term rotation

param.name: painc
param.description: Parallactic angle increment (degrees) for computing A-term

param.name: aterm
param.description: Switch-on the A-Term?

param.name: psterm
param.description: Switch-on the PS-Term?

param.name: mterm
param.description: Switch-on the M-Term?

param.name: wbawp
param.description: Trigger the wide-band A-Projection algorithm?

param.name: conjbeams
param.description: Use frequency conjugate beams in WB A-Projection algorithm?

param.name: epjtable
param.description: Table of EP-Jones parameters

param.name: ftmachine
param.description: Gridding method for the image

param.name: mosweight
param.description: Individually weight the fields of the mosaic

param.name: scaletype
param.description: Controls scaling of pixels in the image plane. default=\'SAULT\'; example: scaletype=\'PBCOR\' Options: \'PBCOR\',\'SAULT\'

param.name: multiscale
param.description: Deconvolution scales (pixels); [] = standard clean

param.name: negcomponent
param.description: Stop cleaning if the largest scale finds this number of neg components

param.name: smallscalebias
param.description: a bias to give more weight toward smaller scales

param.name: outframe
param.description: velocity frame of output image

param.name: veltype
param.description: velocity definition (radio, optical, true)

param.name: restoringbeam
param.description: Output Gaussian restoring beam for CLEAN image

param.name: usescratch
param.description: True if to save model visibilities in MODEL_DATA column

param.name: nterms
param.description: Number of Taylor coefficients to model the sky frequency dependence

param.name: reffreq
param.description: Reference frequency (nterms > 1),\'\' uses central data-frequency

param.name: chaniter
param.description: Clean each channel to completion (True), or all channels each cycle (False)

param.name: flatnoise
param.description: Controls whether searching for clean components is done in a constant noise residual image (True) or in an optimal signal-to-noise residual image (False)

param.name: allowchunk
param.description: Divide large image cubes into channel chunks for deconvolution

param.name: addmodel
param.description: Add MODEL_DATA scratch column

param.name: concatvis
param.description: Name of output visibility file

param.name: freqtol
param.description: Frequency shift tolerance for considering data as the same spwid

param.name: dirtol
param.description: Direction shift tolerance for considering data as the same field

param.name: respectname
param.description: If true, fields with a different name are not merged even if their direction agrees

param.name: timesort
param.description: If true, sort by TIME in ascending order

param.name: copypointing
param.description: Copy all rows of the POINTING table.

param.name: visweightscale
param.description: List of the weight scaling factors to be applied to the individual MSs

param.name: spwlist
param.description: Spectral window selection

param.name: outputvis
param.description: Name of output visibility file

param.name: advise
param.description: Boolean to determine if advice on image cell is requested

param.name: passall
param.description: Pass through (write to output MS) non-selected data with no change

param.name: array
param.description: (sub)array indices

param.name: hanning
param.description: If true, Hanning smooth data before regridding to remove Gibbs ringing.

param.name: model
param.description: Output image containing deconvolved point model

param.name: psf
param.description: Point spread function (dirty beam)

param.name: alg
param.description: Algorithm to use (clark, hogbom, multiscale, mem)

param.name: scales
param.description: scale sizes (pixels) to deconvolve

param.name: sigma
param.description: mem parameter: Expected noise in image

param.name: targetflux
param.description: mem parameter: Estimated total flux in image

param.name: prior
param.description: mem parameter: prior image for mem search

param.name: otf
param.description: Delete the on-the-fly model data keywords

param.name: scr
param.description: Delete the MODEL_DATA scr col (if it exists)

param.name: archiveid
param.description: the X0 in uid://X0/X1/X<running>

param.name: rangeid
param.description: the X1 in uid://X0/X1/X<running>

param.name: subscanduration
param.description: maximum duration of a subscan in the output ASDM

param.name: sbduration
param.description: maximum duration of a scheduling block (and therefore exec block) in the output ASDM

param.name: apcorrected
param.description: data to be marked as having atmospheric phase correction

param.name: verbose
param.description: produce log output

param.name: showversion
param.description: Report the version of ASDM class set being used

param.name: useversion
param.description: Selects the version of MS2asdm to be used (\'v3\' (default and only option presently))

param.name: fitsimage
param.description: Name of output image FITS file

param.name: velocity
param.description: Use velocity (rather than frequency) as spectral axis

param.name: optical
param.description: Use the optical (rather than radio) velocity convention

param.name: bitpix
param.description: Bits per pixel

param.name: minpix
param.description: Minimum pixel value (if minpix > maxpix, value is automatically determined)

param.name: maxpix
param.description: Maximum pixel value (if minpix > maxpix, value is automatically determined)

param.name: dropstokes
param.description: Drop the Stokes axis?

param.name: stokeslast
param.description: Put Stokes axis last in header?

param.name: history
param.description: Write history to the FITS image?

param.name: dropdeg
param.description: Drop all degenerate axes (e.g. Stokes and/or Frequency)?

param.name: fitsfile
param.description: Name of output UV FITS file

param.name: avgchan
param.description: Channel averaging width (value > 1 indicates averaging)

param.name: writesyscal
param.description: Write GC and TY tables, (Not yet available)

param.name: multisource
param.description: Write in multi-source format

param.name: combinespw
param.description: Export the spectral windows as IFs

param.name: writestation
param.description: Write station name instead of antenna name

param.name: padwithflags
param.description: Fill in missing data with flags to fit IFs

param.name: highres
param.description: Name of high resolution (interferometer) image

param.name: lowres
param.description: Name of low resolution (single dish) image

param.name: sdfactor
param.description: Scale factor to apply to Single Dish image

param.name: effdishdiam
param.description: New effective SingleDish diameter to use in m

param.name: lowpassfiltersd
param.description: Filter out the high spatial frequencies of the SD image
